CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(Deal_ID_Title__c, "4711") , HYPERLINK( IF ($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d", "/lightning/r/00O2x000003g2hwEAA/view?fv0=", "/00O2x000003es1H?pv0=") & Name, Deal_ID_Title__c &" Ticketing (POE) Report v1.0") + BR()+ HYPERLINK( IF ($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d", "/lightning/r/00O2x000003g2KEEAY/view?fv0=", "/00O2x000003es1H?pv0=") & Name, Deal_ID_Title__c &" Ticketing (POE) Report v2.0"), HYPERLINK( IF ($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d", "/lightning/r/00O2x000003es1H/view?fv0=", "/00O2x000003es1H?pv0=") & Name, Deal_ID_Title__c &" Ticketing (POE) Report"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is Ticketing report for the new TAD Orders (POE)
CustomField.label: Ticketing (POE) Report
